Jobs.title: Business Development Manager
Jobs.description: ', "Highly experienced in Operations & Business Development Professional who has demonstrated the ability to lead diverse teams of professionals to new levels of success in a variety of highly competitive industries, cutting-edge markets, and fast-paced environments. Strong technical and business qualifications with an impressive track record of more than 20 years of hands-on experience in strategic planning, business unit development, project and product management, and system engineering strategies. Proven ability to successfully analyze an organization's critical business requirements, identify deficiencies and potential opportunities, and develop innovative and cost-effective solutions for enhancing competitiveness, increasing revenues, and improving customer service.", '

Jobs.title: Industrial Account Manager and Operation Manager
Jobs.description: ', 'Responsibilities include territory development, identifying & signing national accounts, customer service, over seeing invoicing, billing average revenues of 350k monthly, customer development, forecasting, drive revenue and assist in day to day operation. Customers included JE Merit, BP, Nustar, Valero, Oxy, Celanese, Air Products, Air Liquide, JV Piping, Starcon, P2S,', '

Jobs.title: Project Manager
Jobs.description: ', 'include over seeing all operations and management of construction, sales, subcontracts, and new business developments. My duties included billing, invoicing, including job cost reports, and ordering materials and purchase orders. Projects estimated from 1K to 2 million. Also responsible for interviewing, hiring, training, quality procedures, safety and all aspects of a construction project.', '

Jobs.title: Contracts Manager
Jobs.description: ', 'Responsibilities include over seeing the installation of all electric systems also including design, sizing wire and conduit, transformers, drafting, isometric, also locating panels placement, and transformer locations. Maintain and control of customer orders through sales calls and quotes for projects, communication with customers to assure accuracy of order processing, scheduling and customer satisfaction. Prepare price quotations, estimating, Billing, invoicing, including job cost reports, and ordering materials and purchase orders. Projects estimated from 50K to 5 million. Also responsible for interviewing, hiring, training, quality procedures, safety and all aspects of a construction project.', '

Jobs.title: Project Manager
Jobs.description: ', 'for Thermon Manufacturing Company. Maintain and control of customer orders through sales calls and quotes for projects, communication with customers to assure accuracy of order processing, scheduling and customer satisfaction. Jobs.title: Instrumentation and Pipe General Foreman for Belmont
Jobs.description: ', 'Performed a wide variety of General Foreman duties including material take offs, Quality Control, Reporting and tracking the progress of the project and executing safety procedures.', '
